mapper.select: -- SELECT * from zsdetail where classID = #{classID} SELECT s.ID student_ID,s.name student_name, z.zsName zs_name,z.detail zs_detail,z.mark zs_mark, z.img zs_img,z.time zs_time,z.remark zs_mark, z.userMark zs_userMark,z.shCondition zs_shCondition FROM student s,cxDetail z WHERE s.classID = #{classID}AND s.ID = z.studentId
